game_description: ASMR for VR finally arrives to the Meta Quest. ASMR is a worldwide sensation that now with the help of vr technology unleashes the true auditory and visual experience to all your Meta Quest devices. 12 ASMR videos included. ASMR signifies the subjective experience of "low-grade euphoria‚Äù characterized by "a combination of positive feelings and a distinct static-like tingling sensation on the skin." It is most commonly triggered by specific auditory or visual stimuli, and less commonly by intentional attention control. - Wikipedia
